page.title: 15OTHER ENTERTAINMENTS
page.content: There are two discotheque/night clubs. One is called Bentleys and the other is called Jackie O's. Both were opened in the 1980's. The capacity of Bentley's is 1000 and Jackie O's is 800. Bentley's opens six nights a week and Jackie O's five. Both have lazer lighting. In Jackie O's there is also something called the Time Tunnel which is full of mirrors and lights causing the sensation of disorientation. There is also a bingo hall called Kingsway Entertainments. It was changed from a cinema in 1971 and took Â£1,500,000 to rebuild after a fire. Its capacity is 1,300 and it is open every day from 1 p.m. till 4 p.m. and 6 p.m. till 11 p.m. Johnny's Amusement Arcade, which opened in 1970 is open 7 days a week and can hold 150 people. There are also two snooker clubs.
